channel.title: How to uncomment a code? :S
channel.description:
Hello.. i want to know how do i uncoment this code? [code]
for(int i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.players.length; i++){ Player p = server.playerHandler.players[i]; if(p != null && !p.disconnected && p.connectedFrom.equals(connectedFrom) && playerId != p.playerId && !connectedFrom.equals("localhost") && !checkLog("connect", connectedFrom)){ sM("Address in use!"); returnCode = 9; disconnected = true; return; } }[/code]
Help is appreciated Thanks

item.title: How to uncomment a code? :S
item.dc:creator: @bobsisland bobsisland
item.description:
@bobsisland wrote:

jsut remove the /* and the */ and it’s done. Use notpad++ and the commented will be green.

Read full topic

item.title: How to uncomment a code? :S
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

Well what would it look like commented?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 09, 2009, 02:23:39 pm[/size][hr]This is what it looks like completely.

			// uncomment this code below to stop multiple logins from 1
			// computer.

			 */
			  for(int i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.players.length; i++){
			  Player p = server.playerHandler.players[i]; if(p != null &&
			  !p.disconnected && p.connectedFrom.equals(connectedFrom) &&
			  playerId != p.playerId && !connectedFrom.equals("localhost") && !checkLog("connect", connectedFrom)){
			  sM("Address in use!"); returnCode = 9; disconnected =
			  true; return; } }
			 */

Read full topic

item.title: How to uncomment a code? :S
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

Hello… i want to know how do i uncoment this code?

[code]

		  for(int i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.players.length; i++){
		  Player p = server.playerHandler.players[i]; if(p != null &&
		  !p.disconnected && p.connectedFrom.equals(connectedFrom) &&
		  playerId != p.playerId && !connectedFrom.equals("localhost") && !checkLog("connect", connectedFrom)){
		  sM("Address in use!"); returnCode = 9; disconnected =
		  true; return; } }[/code]

Help is appreciated Thanks
